title: 121: The Food Lab Plays 20 Questions
itunes:title: 121: The Food Lab Plays 20 Questions
itunes:subtitle: J. Kenji Lopez-Alt takes a food-science pop quiz; KFC is short for Korean Fried Chicken; pound cake is reborn; and Adam Gopnik's ode to celery and parsley.
description:
J. Kenji Lopez-Alt takes a food-science pop quiz; KFC is short for Korean Fried Chicken; pound cake is reborn; and Adam Gopnik’s ode to celery and parsley.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
